body.name: Miabella 18K Gold Over Sterling Silver Italian Rosary Cross Bead Charm Link Chain Bracelet for Women Teen Girls, Adjustable, 925 Made in Italy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 19 mins
features: STYLISH AND INSPIRATIONAL - Show your spiritual side with this dainty 18k yellow gold over sterling silver rosary bracelet featuring a classic Miraculous Medal of the Virgin Mary and a polished cross charm that dangles from the chain. Wear it as a symbol of your faith or as a cool fashion statement. Looks just as beautiful with jeans and a t-shirt as it does with dressy attire. Comfortable for everyday wear. Adjustable in length for a perfect fit. Wear alone or layered with other chains.

PURE 925 STERLING SILVER - Handcrafted of 925 sterling silver. Plated with a thick layer of 40 mils 18K yellow gold for added durability. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic and nickel-free making this a great choice for those with very sensitive skin. Unlike cheap metals, sterling silver does not irritate your skin. Bracelet, 7” long with 1” extender. Adjustable length gives maximum comfort and versatility for small to large wrist sizes up to 8” inch long. Strong and secure spring ring clasp.

MADE IN ITALY - Italian jewelry is much more than a fashionable and elegant choice. It is rich in diverse cultural history that has formed a people who strongly value creativity and passion. With a high demand for the luxury of their craft, early artisans led the way for the superior design excellence and quality craftsmanship still used today. Italian jewelry has the highest government quality standards unmatched by any other country in the world, making this a fine investment.

PERFECT GIFT FOR HER - Classic and elegant gift for the modern woman who loves artisan fine jewelry. A bracelet that makes a simple statement with personal style it’s the perfect gift idea for mom, daughter, wife, sister, aunt, niece, best friend, girlfriend or for you. For Confirmation, give her a religious sentimental gift to show her faith. VISIT OUR STORE: For a full selection of 18K gold over silver and sterling silver bracelets, rings, necklace, hoop and stud earrings, and coin jewelry.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED - Miabella jewelry is shipped in an elegant gift box, ready to treat yourself or a loved one for any anniversary, birthday, wedding, graduation, Christmas, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day and any other holiday or special occasion gifting. From cool modern to vintage designs, Miabella offers high quality affordable sterling silver jewelry for men and women, comfortable for everyday wear and for all occasions. 30-day money-back guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have a small wrist. I ordered both sizes, however for layering purposes I am keeping the smaller size. The gold color is beautiful yet subtle not too yellow/gold. I love even more the medallion has the Virgin Mary and seal….very detailed! The size of the beads are the size I would want because I’m a small petite women. I think they’re 1mm maybe even 2mm? Beautifully made highly recommend. I’ve been looking for this exact bracelet for the exact price. Hopefully I will find an identical one that’s 14k gold-but for now this one is perfect! I hope this lasts long and is durable like my other gold filled jewelry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Durable Bracelet
reviews.reviewText: Definitely love the bracelet i just got, the color match perfectly with my skin. So pretty 😍😍. Use it in the shower and the gold definitely held up and not giving me any allergy reactions. A perfect gift to myself

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A precious piece for me. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this bracelet !!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a tiny bracelet that I could not take off. This one is more than perfect because it’s so light and delicate yet sturdy enough to not need to remove during daily life/work. A constant companion and reminder .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve been wearing it everyday. After a week I noticed the gold started to come off of the cross and a few links. I bath with it on so maybe that’s the problem, but my chain and other bracelet never messed up yet so idk. I wear it to sleep and it doesn’t break. I think it’s worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had a picture of this on. I wear it a lot and have gotten it wet a few times and still looks really nice. It's very dainty and I just love the look and quality of this piece. I highly recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly and chic bracelet
reviews.reviewText: I have had this bracelet for over 6 months. It helps me reminds that God is with me in moments of anxiousness. It has lost its sparkled and is not as shiny as it used to be . I am thinking of buying another one because I love it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well worth the price ! I’ve been enjoying the layered look in bracelets and for the price it’s awesome 💕
Very nice, perfect for my daughters little wrist, delicate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: beautiful delicate bracelet. would make a lovely gift for a mother or special friend (gift for myself as I have cancer and I have faith, but also I love Ital) feels very special to wear
可愛い、😍キレイ^_^とても良いです、気に入りましたペアのネックレスもあったら良いな〜😃

reviews.reviewTitle: This is false advertising, the bracket is so tiny.
reviews.reviewText: False advertising, my bracket was so tiny, yet it shows a women's hand and arm. Angry as....

This bracelet is a piece of junk. Although it looks very cute after wearing it one day on the second day putting it on the clasp fell apart. The seller refused to help me with my purchase. Insists I broke it by wearing it. I recommend don’t waste your money on a item that lasts one day. The seller is not easy to work with
